data.text:
Peer-to-Peer Accommodatio

An exclusive Peer-to-Peer Accommodation market research report created through broad primary research (inputs from industry experts, companies, and stakeholders) and secondary research, the report aims to present the analysis of Global Peer-to-Peer Accommodation Market By Type, By Application, By Region - North America, Europe, South America, Asia-Pacific, Middle East and Africa. The report intends to provide cutting-edge market intelligence and help decision makers take sound investment evaluation. Besides, the report also identifies and analyses the emerging trends along with major drivers, challenges and opportunities in the global Peer-to-Peer Accommodation market. Additionally, the report also highlights market entry strategies for various companies across the globe.

Peer-to-Peer Accommodation Market Players:

· Airbnb Inc.

· Flipkey Inc.

· HomeAway, Inc.

· Roomorama

· HouseTrip Ltd.

· Wimdu

· Lifealike Limited

· HomeExchange.com

· Couchsurfing International Inc.

· MyTwinPlace

Market segment by Application, split into

Worldwide Peer-to-Peer Accommodation Market Analysis to 2025 is a specialized and in-depth study of the Peer-to-Peer Accommodation industry with a focus on the global market trend. The report aims to provide an overview of global Peer-to-Peer Accommodation market with detailed market segmentation by product/application and geography. The global Peer-to-Peer Accommodation market is expected to witness high growth during the forecast period. The report provides key statistics on the market status of the Peer-to-Peer Accommodation players and offers key trends and opportunities in the market.

Also, key Peer-to-Peer Accommodation market players influencing the market are profiled in the study along with their SWOT analysis and market strategies. The report also focuses on leading industry players with information such as company profiles, products and services offered, financial information of last 3 years, key development in past five years.
